wikipedia_page.main: Christopher Geoffrey Finlayson (born April 1956) was the chief executive of BG Group plc, a British multinational oil and gas company, for 16 months until 28 April 2014.

response: Chapman stood down at the end of 2012 after 12 years as CEO, and was replaced by Chris Finlayson, previously managing director for 'BG Advance', a business function within the Group. Chapman continued as an advisor to BG Group until he retired in June 2013. Finlayson lost the confidence of the Board in 2014 and resigned, replaced by Andrew Gould.
Chapman stood down at the end of 2012 after 12 years as CEO, and was replaced by Chris Finlayson. Chapman continued as an advisor to BG Group until he retired in June 2013.
